SELECT CLNT_NUM, CLNT_NAME, CLNT_GRADE, PHONE_NUM_1, PHONE_NUM_2, ADRS, DTL_ADRS FROM INDVDL_CLNT WHERE 1=1
AND CLNT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND CLNT_GRADE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND PHONE_NUM_1 LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT N.CNSL_NUM, I.CLNT_NUM, I.CLNT_NAME, I.PHONE_NUM_1, TO_CHAR(N.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE, E.EMP_NAME , CASE WHEN N.CNSL_TYPE_NUM = 0 THEN '민원' WHEN N.CNSL_TYPE_NUM = 1 THEN '상담' WHEN N.CNSL_TYPE_NUM = 2 THEN '기타' END CNSL_TYPE_NUM, CASE WHEN N.CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 0 THEN '완료' WHEN N.CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 1 THEN '미처리' WHEN N.CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 2 THEN '예약' WHEN N.CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 3 THEN '이관' END CNSL_RSLT_NUM FROM(SELECT CLNT_NUM, CLNT_NAME, CLNT_GRADE, PHONE_NUM_1 FROM INDVDL_CLNT )I INNER JOIN CNSL_NOTE N ON I.CLNT_NUM = N.CLNT_NUM INNER JOIN EMP E ON N.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM WHERE I.CLNT_NUM = #{clnt_num} ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT CNSL_NUM, CLNT_NUM, EMP_NUM, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE, CASE WHEN CNSL_TYPE_NUM = 0 THEN '민원' WHEN CNSL_TYPE_NUM = 1 THEN '상담' WHEN CNSL_TYPE_NUM = 2 THEN '기타' END CNSL_TYPE_NUM, CONT, CASE WHEN CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 0 THEN '완료' WHEN CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 1 THEN '미처리' WHEN CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 2 THEN '예약' WHEN CNSL_RSLT_NUM = 3 THEN '이관' END CNSL_RSLT_NUM FROM CNSL_NOTE WHERE CNSL_NUM = #{cnsl_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INDVDL_CLNT(CLNT_NUM, CLNT_NAME, CLNT_GRADE, PHONE_NUM_1, PHONE_NUM_2, ADRS, DTL_ADRS) VALUES (INDVDL_CLNT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{clnt_name}, #{clnt_grade}, #{phon_num_1}, #{phon_num_2}, #{adrs}, #{dtl_adrs})

INSERT INTO CNSL_NOTE(CNSL_NUM, CLNT_NUM, EMP_NUM, CNSL_TYPE_NUM, CONT, CNSL_RSLT_NUM, WRITE_DATE) VALUES (CNSL_NOTE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{clnt_num}, #{emp_num}, #{cnsl_type_num}, #{cont}, #{cnsl_rslt_num}, #{write_date})
